summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1831, for the improvement of Walden Street, from Renton Avenue to Horton Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by attaching hydrants to the existing water mains therein, with all appurtenances necessary for the proper fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 19023 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
